data.text: While the macronutrients are present in plant tissue in quantities219Macedonian Pharmaceutical Bulletin 57 (suppl), 2011MEDICINAL AND AROMATIC PLANTSposter presentationsFIFTH CONGRESS OF PHARMACY OF MACEDONIA WITH INTERNATIONAL PARTICIPATIONfrom 0.2% to 4.0% (on a dry matter weight basis), micronutrients arepresent in quantities less than 0.02% (2).Recycling organic matter such as grass clippings and tree leaves is anexcellent way of providing micronutrients (as well as macronutrients)to growing plants. On the other hand, a number of studies have beencarried out on the utilization of wood ash in agriculture and forestryas an alternative method for disposal. Wood ash as an excellent sourceof potassium, lime and other elements (calcium, magnesium, man-ganese, aluminium, phosphorous, sulfur, iron, sodium, zinc) can be usedeither as a soil amendment in agriculture or to correct forest nutrientdeficiencies or unbalances (4).Based on all of the previously mentioned, the aim to this study was toobtain data for the plant nutrients content in Pinus peuce dried nee-dles and branches v.s. their content in the plant residue after distilla-tion of essential oil in order to use them as natural fertilizer.Plant material was collected on three different localities in R. Mace-donia (Pelister, Shara Mtn. and Nidze Mtn. ), in June 2009.0.5 g of dried and minced needles, branches with needles and brancheswithout needles were placed in Teflon digestion vessels. 8 ml concen-trated nitric acid and 2 ml H2O2 (30 %, m/V) were added, and the ves-sels were capped closed, tightened and placed in the rotor of theMarsx microwave digestion (CEM, USA) for mineralization. Finally, thevessels were cooled, carefully opened, and digests were quantitativelytransferred to 25 ml calibrated flasks. The investigated 20 elements(Al, As, B, Ba, Ca, Cd, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, K, Mg, Mn, Na, Ni, P, Pb, Sr, V, Zn)were analyzed by atomic emission spectrometry with inductivelycoupled plasma, AES-ICP (Varian, Model 715-ES, USA). Determinationof N was carried out according to the Kjeldahl method using 1 g ofplant material.Among 20 investigated elements, the most abundant macronutrientsin the Pinus peuce needles, branches with needles and branches with-out needles were potassium (2084-4277 mg/kg) and calcium (1240-2007 mg/kg). The plant residues after distillation of the essential oilcontain smaller amounts of potassium and larger amounts of calcium(estimated on dried mass), which is probably due to the differences inelements solubility in hot water during the process of distillation. Themagnesium and phosphorus content ranges from 454-696 mg/kg and497-1364 mg/kg, respectively, and is diminished in the dried plantresidue after distillation, while the presence of nitrogen ranges from7420 to 18340 mg/kg and is generally present in the same quantitiesas it was in starting plant material.The trace elements that were analyzed were nickel (0.38-9.22 mg/kg),copper (2.11-29.49 mg/kg), sodium (2.74-109.71 mg/kg), manganese(17.55-144.0 mg/kg), zinc (26.81-45.01 mg/kg), iron (34.92-121.45 mg/kg)and boron (37.57-101.21 mg/kg). The content of nickel, copper andsodium in hole plant dried residue after distillation of essential oil issmaller in comparison with starting material, while iron, zinc and boronare generally present in larger amount. In the most cases, themanganese content is changed depending on the locality and on plantmaterial. According to literature data, aluminium is important as woodash element (4), although it isn't considered as micronutrient. Thecontent of aluminum in the dried plant material ranges from 47-544mg/kg and is mostly present in the larger amount in the plant residueafter distillation of essential oil.Investigated plant material (needles, branches with needles andbranches without needles from Pinus peuce) is a source of macro andmicronutrients that are necessary for growth and development ofplants, thus the material that remains after distillation of essential oilcan be interesting for consideration towards its utilization as naturalfertilizer.REFERENCES1. Kuznetsova T, Mandre M. (2005) Mineral composition of lodgepole pine (Pinusconcorta var. latifolia Englem) on exhausted oil shale opencast mines. Forestrystudies, 42:105-115.2. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plant_nutrition3. http://www.ncagr.gov/cyber/kidswrld/plant/nutrient.htm4. Liodakis S, Katsigiannis G, LymperopoulouT. (2007) Ash properties of Pinushalepensis neddles treated with diammonium phosphate. Thermochimica Acta,453:136-146.SODRZhINA NA MAKRO IMIKRONUTRIENTI VO IGLIChKI I VOGRANKI OD MOLIKA (PINUS PEUCEGRISEB., PINACEAE) PRED I PODESTILATsIJA NA ETERIChNO MASLOMarija Karapandzhova1, Gjoshe Stefkov1, TrajcheStafilov2, Katerina Bacheva2, SvetlanaKulevanova11Institut za Farmakognozija, Farmatsevtski fakultet,Univerzitet "Sv. Kiril i Metodij", Skopje, Makedonija2Institut za Khemija, Prirodno-matematichki fakultet, Univerzitet"Sv. Kiril i Metodij", Skopje, MakedonijaRastot i razvojot na rastenijata vo golema mera zavisi kako odfizichko-khemiski karak teristiki na pochvata, taka i od dostapno-sta na khranlivite materii i nivniot soodnos. Rastenijataselektivno gi asimiliraat nutrientite vo soglasnost so nivnitebioloshki potrebi. Site tie se neopkhodno potrebni i nitu eden odniv ne mozhe da bide zamenet so drug, bidejkji sekoj element imasvoja zasebna funktsija (1). Postojat dva definirani kriteriumispored koi elementite se smetaat za neopkhodni za rast narastenijata: vo nivno otsustvo, rastenieto ne mozhe da ostvaruvanormalen zhivoten tsiklus ili elementot e sostaven del naopredeleni komponenti ili metaboliti bitni za rastenieto (2).Denes se poznati devetnaeset khemiski elementi vazhni za rastot iza opstanokot na rastenijata. Ovie elementi se podeleni vo dvegrupi: ne-mineralni i mineralni. Vo grupata na ne-mineralninutrienti spa gjaat vodorod, kislorod i jaglerod i istite se naogjaatvo vozdukhot i vo vodata. Vo protsesot na fotosinteza, rastenijatago preveduvaat jaglerodeniot dioksid (SO2) i vodata (H2O) voskrob i shekjer koi se smetaat za osnovna rastitelna khrana. Ostana-tite 13 mineralni nutrienti, shto gi ima vo pochvata, se rastvorenivo vodata i se absorbiraat preku korenot. Ne sekogash ovienutrienti se zastapeni vo dovolni kolichini vo pochvata, poradishto vo zemjodelstvoto i vo gradinarstvoto se koristat veshtachkigjubriva so koi tie se dodaat vo pochvata. Mineralnite nutrientise podeleni na makro i mikronutrienti. Makronutrienti mozhat dabidat primarni (azot, fosfor i kalium), koi najchesto nedosta-suvaat vo poch vata, bidejkji rastenijata koristat golemi kolichinina ovie elementi za rast i opstanok i sekun darni (kaltsium,magnezium i sulfur), koi se naogjaat vo dovolni kolichini, osobenosulfurot. Ovoj makroelement se sozdava so bavno raspagjanje naorganskite materii vo pochvata, shto pretstavuva edna od prichi-nitezoshto kosenata treva i padnatite listovi ne treba da se frlaat.Mikronutrienti (bor, bakar, zhelezo, khlor, mangan, molibden, tsink,nikel, selen i natrium) se neokhodni za rast na rastenijata i se po-220Makedonski farmatsevtski bilten 57 (dodatok), 2011MEDITsINSKI I AROMATIChNI RASTENIJA poster prezentatsiiPETTI KONGRES NA FARMATsIJATA SO MEGjUNARODNO UChESTVOtrebni vo mnogu mali (mikro) kolichini. Ovie elementi se poznatii kako elementi vo tragovi (2, 3). Dodeka makronutrienti-te seprisutni vo rastitelnite tkiva od 0,2 % do 4,0 % (smetano na suvamasa), mi-kronutrienti se prisutni vo kolichestva pomali od 0,02 % (2). Retsikliranje na organskiot materijal kako shto se kosenata trevai padnatite listovi e odlichen nachin za obezbeduvanje na mikro-nutrienti (kako i makronutrienti) neopkhodni za rast i razvoj narastenijata. Od druga strana, napraveni se golem broj studii zavoveduvanje na alternativen metod za iskoristuvanje na pepelta oddrvesinata vo zemjodelstvoto i vo shumarstvoto. Ovaa pepel kakoodlichen izvor na kalium, var i drugi elementi (kaltsium, magnezi-um, mangan, aluminium, fosfor, sulfur, zhelezo, natrium, tsink)mozhe da se koristi kako dodatok na pochvata vo zemjodelstvoto iliza koregiranje na ne dos ta tokot ili disbalansot na nutrientite (4). Vrz osnova na seto dosega kazhano, tselta na ovoj trud e da se dobijatpodatotsi za sodrzhinata na nutrientite vo iglichki i vo granki odmolika pred i po destilatsija na eterichno maslo, so tsel nivnaupotreba kako prirodno gjubrivo.Rastitelen materijal e sobran na tri razlichni lokaliteti voRepublika Makedonija (Pelister, Shar Planina i Nidzhe), vo juni2009 godina.Podgotovkata na rastitelniot materijal e na pra vena od 0,5 g suvii usitneti igli chki, granki so iglichki i granki bez igli chki koi sestavaat vo teflonski sadovi za mineralizatsija, se dodavaat 8 mlkontsentrirana azotna kiselina i 2 ml H2O2 (30 % m/v), sadovitese zatvoraat, se pristegnuvaat i se stavaat vo rotorot na mikro-branova pechka za digestija (CEM, USA) i mineralizatsija. Na kraj,sadovite se ladat, vnimatelno se otvoraat i sodrzhi natakvantitativno se prenesuva vo 25 ml tikvichki. Ispituvanite 20elementi (Al, As, B, Ba, Ca, Cd, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, K, Mg, Mn, Na, Ni, P, Pb,Sr, V, Zn) se analizirani so pomosh na atomska emisionaspektrometrija so induktivno spregmnata plazma, AES-ICP (Varian,Model 715-ES, USA). Oprede lu vanje na N e napraveno po metodot naKjeldahl na 1 g rastitelen materijal.Od vkupno 20 ispituvani elementi, najzastapeni makronutrientivo iglichki, vo gra nki so iglichki i vo granki bez iglichki od molikase kalium (2084-4277 mg/kg) i kaltsium (1240-2007 mg/kg). Ostatokotpo destilatsija na eterichno maslo sodrzhi pomali kolichini nakalium i pogolemi kolichini na kaltsium (smetano na suva masa), shtonajverojatno se dolzhi na razli kite vo rastvorlivosta naelementite vo topla voda za vreme na destilatsijata. Sodr zhinata namagneziumot i na fosforot se dvizhi od 454-696 mg/kg i 497-1364mg/kg, soodve tno i e namalena vo ostatok po destilatsija, dodekasodrzhinata na azotot se dvizhi od 7420-18340 mg/kg i generalno eista kako vo pochetniot rastitelen materijal.Od mikroelementite, opredeleni se nikel (0,38-9,22 mg/kg), bakar(2,11-29,49 mg/kg), natrium (2,74-109,71 mg/kg), mangan (17,55- 144,00mg/kg), tsink (26,81-45,01 mg/kg), zhelezo (34,92-121,45 mg/kg) i bor(37,57-101,21 mg/kg). Sodrzhinata na ni-kel, bakar i natrium voisushen ostatok od drogata po destilatsija na eterichno maslo epomala vo sporedba so pocheten materi-jal, dodeka zhelezo, tsink ibor generalno se prisutni vo pogolema kolichina. Vo povekjetosluchai, sodrzhinata na manganot se menuva vo zavisnost odlokalitetot i od rastitelen materijal. Spored literaturni tepodatotsi, iako ne se smeta za mikro nutrient, aluminiumot e vazhenelement na pepelot od drvesinata (4). Sodrzhinata na aluminiumot vosuv rastitelen materijal od molika se dvizhi od 47-544 mg/kg inajchesto e prisuten vo pogolemi kolichini vo ostatokot po destilatsija. Ispituvaniot rastitelen materijal (igli chki, granki so iglichki igranki bez igli chki od molika) pretstavuva izvor na makro imikronutrienti neopkhodni za rast i razvoj na rastenijata, poradishto materijalot shto ostanuva po destilatsija na eterichni maslamozhe da bide interesen za razgleduvanje vo nasoka na negovotoisko ris tuvanje kako prirodno gjubrivo.LITERATURA1. Kuznetsova T, Mandre M. (2005) Mineral composition of lodgepole pine (Pinusconcorta var. latifolia Englem) on exhausted oil shale opencast mines. Forestrystudies, 42:105-115.2. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plant_nutrition3. http://www.ncagr.gov/cyber/kidswrld/plant/nutrient.htm4. Liodakis S, Katsigiannis G, LymperopoulouT. (2007) Ash properties of Pinushalepensis neddles treated wpith diammonium phosphate. Thermochimica Acta,453:136-146.AN ETHNOBOTANICAL STUDY IN KAHRA-MANMARAS (TURKEY); WILD PLANTS USEDAS ECONOMIC PURPOSE IN ANDIRIN,KAHRAMANMARASSerpil Demirci, Neriman OzhatayIstanbul University, Faculty of Pharmacy, Department of Pharmaceu-tical Botany, 34116 Beyazit/Istanbul, TURKEYINTRODUCTIONTurkey is one of the most floristically rich countries in the world withastonishing plant diversity. Its flora consists of about 11000 vascularplant and approximately one third of its flora (34,4 %) is endemic to thecountry.
